eatTheFrog.title: Eat the Frog
eatTheFrog.content: Start your day by tackling your most challenging or important task first. This technique helps you build momentum and ensures your biggest priority gets done when your energy is highest.

todaysTasks.title: Today's Tasks
todaysTasks.content: Focus on completing specific tasks scheduled for today. Keep your daily task list manageable and actionable to maintain productivity and avoid overwhelm.

pomodoroTechnique.title: Pomodoro Technique
pomodoroTechnique.content: Work in focused 25-minute intervals followed by 5-minute breaks. After 4 pomodoros, take a longer 15-30 minute break. This technique helps maintain focus and prevents burnout.

goalSetting.title: Goal Setting
goalSetting.content: Break down large goals into smaller, actionable milestones. Set specific deadlines and regularly review your progress to stay on track and motivated.

sparkAI.title: Spark AI
sparkAI.content:
**Record one item at a time for best results.**

**Tasks:** "Buy groceries tomorrow"
**Goals:** "Save 10,000 euros"
**Milestones:** "Get first client by March"

**Link to existing goals:**
Say the goal name clearly:
"This milestone is for my saving 10,000 euros goal"
"Add task to my fitness goal"

**Tips:**
• Speak 5-15 seconds
• Use exact goal names
• Be specific with dates
• One item per recording

visionBoard.title: Vision Board
visionBoard.content:
Create your visual inspiration board in two ways:

**Upload Images:** Add personal photos from your gallery that represent your dreams and goals.

**Generate with Spark:** Use Spark AI to create custom vision images based on your descriptions.

Your vision board helps you visualize and stay motivated toward achieving your goals.
